alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 6:19PM EDT until July 11 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek At Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...From this evening to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding and water begins to flood nearby homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:01 PM EDT Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 03/15/1986. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 pm: 8.0 Forecast: Mon 8 pm 8.1 Tue 2 am 7.8 Tue 8 am 7.2 Tue 2 pm 6.7 Tue 8 pm 6.2 Wed 2 am 5.6 &&
